Class LineReader

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.LineReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
LineReaderNdorGate, LineReaderNdotBeacon, PromptReader
public class LineReader extends Object
Simple text line reader. This class should be used instead of BufferedReader.readLine whenever input is untrusted, because if no line seperator is found, BufferedReader will happily keep reading text until all memory is exhausted.
Author:
Douglas Lau
